About The CompanyInnovative SaaS AI scale-upIndustryComputer SoftwareTypePrivately Held, VC-backedFounded2016Employees51-200Funding$26-$50 millionCategoriesArtificial IntelligenceAugmented RealityMachine LearningNatural Language ProcessingVirtual RealityInformation Technology & ServicesTechnologyBusiness ClassificationsB2BEnterpriseAbout The RoleThe Vice President of Federal will be responsible for leading the organization's sales operations and developing a comprehensive partnership program to ensure increased growth and market expansion.Hiring Manager TitleChief Revenue Officer (CRO)Travel PercentLess than 10%FunctionsGeneral ManagementOperationsStrategyKnown RequirementsBachelor’s degree and at least 3 years' experience in managing a software sales team selling into the Department of Defense requiredSolid knowledge of the SBIR process requiredAbility to thrive in fast-paced, technology-driven environments required
